## Interactive Visualization

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| eval: true
#| fig-width: 8
#| fig-height: 5

# Generate sample data for interactive plot
library(ggplot2)

data <- data.frame(
  x = seq(0, 10, 0.1),
  y = sin(seq(0, 10, 0.1)) + rnorm(101, 0, 0.1)
)

ggplot(data, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_line(color = "#667eea", size = 1.2) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5, color = "#764ba2") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Interactive Data Visualization",
       x = "X Variable", y = "Y Variable")
```
